name: Camphor
description:
A short 'bitsy poem' about my feelings towards fireflies.

Made in the span of around 2 hours on a whim on the 9th of February, 2023. Plays for 30 seconds to a minute. Inspired by a recent listen to 'The Campfire Headphase' by Boards of Canada. You play as a worm in a forest swerving through rocks and trees to see fireflies.

Best paired with 'Peacock Tail' by Boards of Canada.
